reviews.text:
This place has a lively and vibrant atmosphere, making it a great spot for happy hour.

The drinks menu is well-priced during happy hour, with a good selection of cocktails, beers, and wines. The cocktails are well-mixed and refreshing.

The ambiance, enhanced by live music, creates a fun and relaxed vibe, perfect for unwinding after work. Service is friendly and attentive. It is a great spot for drinks and good vibes.

Visited on Friday night. This is a very good spot to enjoy the live music, the first live music more on thr jazzy music, one of the best in town, second live band, majority on mandarin and English song. Best place to chill for the weekend.

Food was hit and miss - roasted chicken and the salad was really good but calamari/wings and other fried items are misses. HH till 7pm only. Music is great but donâ€™t expect to have good conversation except in between sets.

A classic bar right at the heart of the city, in the corner of Emerald Hill. Staff are always accommodating and friendly, and we love our queen Mimie ðŸ«¶ the chicken here is huge n aMAZING and joooicy and the garlic chili here is made fresh..itâ€™s the bomb ðŸ”¥ (not to mention the live music is amazing)

Mimi , Lili & team gave the best customer services. Our table was well served and had lots of laughter.
Utmost, AOCheng, Mavis(live band) brought LIFE to the place.
